messages.title: Change the Direction of the Country
messages.content: The referendum result was bad enough. But when I saw Labour MPs join with UKIP and the Conservatives to vote for a damaging hard Brexit, it felt even worse. This isn't what I want for my children or my country.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes hard Brexit and believes being outside the single market isn't good for Britain. Advocates for the final say on the Brexit deal in a referendum.
Aims to stop more harsh cuts to our NHS.
Wants to prevent heartless cuts to benefits for bereaved families.

issues.brexitEurope: Opposes hard Brexit; supports a final say on Brexit through a referendum.
issues.economy: Mentions the negative impact of a hard Brexit on jobs, food prices, and industry.
issues.governance: Criticizes the current government's stance on Brexit and implies a lack of openness and tolerance.
issues.health: Wants to stop more harsh cuts to our NHS.
issues.socialWelfare: Wants to prevent heartless cuts to benefits for bereaved families.

leaflet.personalStatement: Please join with me and help change Britain's future in this election.
leaflet.additionalNotes: PS I'd love to hear your views on Brexit and other issues. Please do complete the enclosed survey.
